actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Hearings held. Hearings printed: S.Hrg. 109-314.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to make incentive payments to the owners or operators of qualified desalination facilities to partially offset the cost of electrical energy required to operate the facilities, and for other purposes.
short_title: Desalination Water Supply Shortage Prevention Act of 2005
subjects: Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Desalination Water Supply Shortage Prevention Act of 2005 - Requires the Secretary of Energy to make specified incentive payments to the owners or operators of qualified desalination facilities (facilities first used to produce desalinated water after enactment of this Act) for up to ten years to partially offset the cost of electrical energy required to operate such facilities.

titles.title: Desalination Water Supply Shortage Prevention Act of 2005

A bill to direct the Secretary of Energy to make incentive payments to the owners or operators of qualified desalination facilities to partially offset the cost of electrical energy required to operate the facilities, and for other purposes.
